website_summaries.verdict: User-friendly pump bottles and alcohol-free formula make this a good choice for sensitive skin.
pros: doesn't contain fragrance, dyes, or alcohol
Includes 3 pump bottles that are easy for little hands to operate
cons: Consistency is on the watery side, so takes a while to dry

customer_reviews.title: NOT organic AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: VERY MISLEADING. There is NOTHING that is certified organic in this entire bottle formulation. The front of the bottle says, "Discover which of our ingredients are certified organic on the back panel". When you read the back panel, it says in very small print on the bottom, "This product does not contain Certified Organic Ingredients". Unbelievable. I am disgusted at how misleading this product is. Will never buy again and I'll be throwing this away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Does not kill Covid - 19 Virus
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kids in this terrifying Corona situation. After buying the product, done some online research and its said that according to CDC, the active ingredient mentioned in the hand sanitizer does not kill Covid -19 Virus.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Vergis

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain Certified Organic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: “Discover which of our ingredients are Certified Organic on back panel.” Answer is none. The bottom left of the back panel states “this product does not contain Certified Organic ingredients”. Therefore, why made mention of Certified Organic ingredients?
customer_reviews.author: Designer Epic's owner

customer_reviews.title: Life saving after blowouts
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have around at the nursery for cleaning my hands (not baby’s). Sometimes after changing a blowout you have to dress baby and won’t have a way to wash your hands before doing so, so this hand sanitizer will help clean up enough to get going. It doesn’t contain alcohol so it takes a little bit longer to dry. But that’s good, because it also means it won’t crack your hands / make your hands super dry like a regular hand sanitizer would do.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Zago

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is alcohol-free so it's less drying on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is alcohol-free so it's less drying on my hands, but the trade off is that it takes a couple of minutes to dry. It's a small inconvenience, and I still prefer this to alcohol based sanitizers, but I wish there was a way to make it dry faster.
customer_reviews.author: E. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry out your hands and love the no fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dry out your hands and love the no fragrance! You won't get the alcohol cooling feeling when using this product and it takes a bit longer to rub in (by a few seconds), but the BIG plus side is that your hands don't dry out with multiple uses per day and you aren't overwhelmed since there is no scent. Using hand sanitizer many times per day, this product is a life saver and also makes me feel better about touching sensitive skin (like babies) and my own skin knowing that my hands aren't covered in germs, super perfume-y smell, and alcohol and chemicals. I have eczema and very dry, sensitive skin and have had no issues with this sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Does not kill coronavirus
customer_reviews.text: I work in a healthcare clinic and live with a nurse who works in a hospital. I really want to have hand sanitizer on hand for us at home. Since hand sanitizer is sold out everywhere I thought I struck gold with this. However only after purchasing it, I looked up the active ingredient in this sanitizer and learned this doesn’t kill the coronavirus, thus its useless and I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Pema Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not for COVID-19 if that’s your reason for buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is good to have as a backup but not really what I need for protection as this is not alcohol based hand sanitizer which doesn’t protect or kill COVID-19 virus. Just be aware that this won’t kill the virus if that is your reason for buying.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ramli

customer_reviews.title: Must-have item for the house with a newborn!
customer_reviews.text: I have one in the kitchen/living room, one in the nursery (next to the diaper changing mat), and one in the bathroom. We definitely use it daily. I have the portable ones in my bags all the time. Foaming is great but I am feeling that some people may think that it is hand soap. Only thing is that you need to be careful not to push it all the way down. You just need to push tiny bit to get enough amount for your hand. I don't like strong scented hand sanitizer so this is so perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Babharu

customer_reviews.title: Add alcohol for hire effectiveness against covid-19.
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is less harsh on my skin then alcohol-based hand sanitizer for covid-19 however I have added some alcohol to the mix and it still phone works well and is more effective against covid-19 based on my research.
customer_reviews.author: joshed

customer_reviews.title: No alcohol. No corona protection.
customer_reviews.text: Warning. No alcohol. No corona control. CDC says must have 60%-95% alcohol for corona. This has 0%. And charging over $6 per bottle. But it does smell nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Slce123

customer_reviews.title: These are great! They foam up like hand soap from Target ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They foam up like hand soap from Target and they leave your hands feeling nice and moisturized! I've always used Purell brand and it makes my hands feel like the Sahara Desert. I hope this stuff is as effective at killing bacteria because I never want to use that other style again! Also, for you new baby people. Order 9 of these. You need one for the nanny, one for each car, one for each room and one for the diaper bag. It's ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT Work on CoronaVirus
customer_reviews.text: Found out AFTER i bought this product that in order to work on the Coronavirus it must contain at least 60% alcohol . This has zero. Completely useless. Even for any other reason - they say the less alcohol the less bacteria it can fight so at zero - it would appear it fights zero bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: lavenderose007

customer_reviews.title: Watery for hand sanitizer almost like you've just splashed your hands in water
customer_reviews.text: Watery for hand sanitizer almost like you've just splashed your hands in water. All about preference I think. Not a fan of this sanitizer but the soap product is good. Would only buy again if I really couldn't find another baby safe hand sanitizer but I wash my hands instead. Its an okay substitute for washing your hands for someone in a rush
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird scent - leaves hands sticky
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of these but I have multiple issues with this order. 1. I ordered this, was told it was shipped, then was told undeliverable, then my order was canceled and then the price went up $2 (suspicious in these pandemic times...) 2. This seems to have a weird/sweet smell to it that I don’t care for 3. I feel that my hands are a bit sticky after using this... not a fan. While I think this isn’t as drying as some other antibacterial stuff - I’m really not a fan and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Upd: Changed the rating from 4 stars to 5 stars because of a great customer service! After contacting them about the empty bottle we recieved, they send us a new set of 3 for no charge! Gret product, will defenitely purchase it again! *** Absolutely great product! It has no scent and it doesn't irritate the skin. However, one of the bottles I recieved was empty and the box was damaged. I guess it leaked during shipping :(
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: A must for new normal in post covid19 era
customer_reviews.text: I am very happen with this purchase, I purchase this for my kid, and she is happy to use it everyday. I keep on in the car, one in door entrance, and one in bathroom that way we can always reach to it whenever we are and not have to worry about where we can find it. kids love it because it produce form and they like to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Yao C.

customer_reviews.title: So much easier on hands than alcohol
customer_reviews.text: I have chronically dry hands which are made worse by washing hands or using alcohol sanitizer. This sanitizer in gentle on my skin, yet strong enough to kill most of the viruses out there. It's also good as an antiseptic for cleaning wounds (and doesn't sting open wounds). I'm not sure about the safety of the product on the neurological system, but I've used it for years anyway since my dry hands can't handle other alternatives as easily.
customer_reviews.author: MMom

customer_reviews.title: Although gentle enough for baby use
customer_reviews.text: Just want to tell other buyers that two of the three bottles come in leaking and only 1/2 left in the bottle. I know it's very hard to buy this kind of staffs during the period of time, but it doesn't mean the seller should sell the defeated items to customers. I keep them is just because I need them for my baby. Nice scent. The size is normal, not good for travel. The foaming design is very convenient in use.
customer_reviews.author: dingdingdangdang

customer_reviews.title: does not kill COVID...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because of a family member with cancer needing hand sanitizer....my bad...should have read the reviews..DOES NOT KILL COVID...Another family member has been using it because of spouse with cancer...Need to let people know it does not kill COVID...I'm wondering if I add a bottle of alcohol (70% ) if we could still use it...Is it returnable? I also ordered what I assume were "refill" bottles as well...
customer_reviews.author: velvet

customer_reviews.title: Not a baby, just sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grown ass woman but im really sensitive to scents & chemicals, etc. Glad I gave this a try because its amazing! No scent, very gentle, & non-drying. I also happened to discover a secondary use for it: cleaning piercings! Sounds weird... but again with my sensitive little self, anything but cool water or saline dries my skin which is extra awful around piercing sites. So i use it on my nipple piercings, belly piercing, ear piercings and also to clean the jewelry itself when not in my body. Would reccomend to anyone who has baby skin like me (even grown ass women lol)
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: The kind of clean you can rest easy with
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the entire Babyganics line. I have been using this hand sanitizer for a few years now and I love that it scores well with the EWG. No harsh chemicals and alcohol on my kids. I keep one pump in the front seat of my car and another in the kitchen. I used the third to fill my small to-go pumps for my diaper bag. I love that it’s fragrance free and it’s not at all sticky. My kids go crazy over the foam aspect. I will continue to keep buying these! Great price too.

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: i love this so much , it helps my toddler sanitizer his hands while we are out in public, especially when all of this virus that is going on i use it at home every-time he touches anything , this is my to go product for my child, and it kills 99.99% effective, so it kill those germs , it’s even alcohol free for your toddler , i will recommend everyone to buy this !or buy anyone this for a gift for your toddler !!
customer_reviews.author: isselle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep around the house
customer_reviews.text: We had a preemie baby in December, and with flu season in full force we had these scattered throughout our entire house! The pump makes it so convenient and they never caused our hands to dry out. The smell is neutral and thankfully does not have an alcohol smell. This product is much better than purell, we now keep this on hand year round. These bottles are a bit large to be used for traveling, but they do sell a travel size that we keep in our diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it works as same function as alcohol hand sanitizer during Coronavirus time. Put it as handy use at home rather than none.
customer_reviews.author: Fong

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, it doesn't actually foam
customer_reviews.text: Not really foaming, unless you shake like you're shaking a can of soda in hopes of handing it to so.eone you don't like. Normally you get a weird, thin, viscous liquid that you get way too much of (from one pump) and find you are just willing your hands on something else- COMPLETELY NEGATING THE USE OF HAND SANITIZER. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Alcohol-free
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my best friend. Her child has been using it. The coronavirus is very dangerous now.I asking my children to wash their hands every day. This is for their convenience when playing with toys. This is alcohol-free. I think it can only be cleaned normally.I feel good to cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I started using this hand sanitizer when I was pregnant and needed something to kill germs and not dry out my hands. This fit the bill for sure. We kept them all around the house when we first brought our baby home and offered it to visitors too. There is no scent, which I appreciate. It doesn't dry immediately and you do have to rub it in or wave your hands in the air to help it dry. But for me, this isn't a deal breaker. I would much rather use something that doesn't dry out my hands or leave a strong alcohol smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this sanitizes hands
customer_reviews.text: It's foamy and sticky and does NOT include alcohol necessary to sanitize, so you probably need to wash you hands after using. Not sure what it is supposed to be used for, if not for preventing the transmission of disease.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: One of the bottles was completely empty
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the item, which was a total pain. Will repurchase from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I would order again sadly.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have Celiac Disease and cannot use ethyl alcohol hand sanitizer because of the wheat. This sanitizer is strangely watery, head almost no scent, leaves out hands feeling strange, and not very moisturized. It just makes me wonder if it's actually working. I understand it is made up use for children so it needs to be gentle. Idk if I would order again......
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Received fast
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet, so I can't really comment on the scent and moisturizing, but received very quickly and packaged neatly in a box. I wouldn't quite say they're for traveling, they're the bigger bottles, however babyganics does have smaller sized ones that I believe would be better used for traveling, I just don't believe these would be ideal for traveling. Other than that, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Strange sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t feel like it’s cleaning anything. There is no scent and it feels like water. Really weird.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Puffer

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, alcohol free, fragrance free, foaming cleanser. But this product is SO watery it drips everywhere when I pump it just one pump. Unfortunately I bought a pack of 3, only thing available on Amazon. I tried another bottle to see if maybe the first one was defective. No, it was the same. I didn't want to send the order back after opening 2, then told myself it would (probably) magically get thicker over time. What thinking is that? Like I said, "magical." It's watery start to finish. I do not recommend this nor would I ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to have at my home when my grandson was born so everyone that came to visit could use before holding him. It was convient and easy to use. It didn't bother any that used it and it doesn't gave much of a smell that people would be e affected by. Like it came in a multiple pack so it was placed everywhere the baby would be and handy to use. Highly recommend to use. Easy to take for travel to use when we go shopping or go to doctors appointments.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: bought it by accident but must have been "meant to be". I love it coming out as a foam and with a pump.. Also glad to have it being alcohol and fragrance free. Can't find many products like that. Gentle on hands. I have a container in the door of my car and use it every time I come out of the stores. It's less drippy than liquid form. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Used by my doctor but deceptive
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews, I was concerned about effectiveness, but this was the sanitizer that was being used at my trusted pediatrician’s this morning. All three of the bottles, were 90% full, I’m assuming the head space helps with the foaming process. Deceptive: not organic see yellow boxes in pics.... the pic of the back of the product shown on amazon does not mention non organic.
customer_reviews.author: a g.

customer_reviews.title: Best for frequent uses - no alcohol smell
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hand sanitizer! It has no scent and quickly absorbs into the skin because it dispenses as foam. When changing newborn diapers this hand sanitizer saved my hands - other brands were too intense with alcohol smells and dried out my skin. I also like this brand's travel sized pumps and the mandarin fragrance is a great option as well.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Southern Mother

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It takes a REALLY long time to dry. Yeah it's a good thing, probably, that it's not contained alcohol, but it doesn't appear that anything in it kills germs. After about a week or two of using it stops being foaming, instead it is very watery and when it pumps it comes with almost water with just little but bubble on it. It makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Aelin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Picture is deceiving-bottles are much smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn’t leave your hands sticky. Only negative- the bottle size is deceiving. These bottles are a lot smaller than I expected. They are the size of a mini dawn hand soap. From the pictures I thought I was getting bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Baggetta

customer_reviews.title: Not killing virus
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and not killing virus. I bought wrong hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wedison

customer_reviews.title: cannot kill virus
customer_reviews.text: didn’t pay attention until I received it. this is only for killing germs, but not virus, which makes it not useful theses days
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting our little one!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are alcohol free and safe for visitors to use before handling the baby. We put these in our living room to give our guests a “hint” to make sure their hands are clean when handling the baby. We also put one next to the changing table so we can do a quick hand cleaning before and after diaper changes. Of course it’s best to wash with soap and water, but sometimes that’s not always practical when you have a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Nursery
customer_reviews.text: We have this in nearly every room in the house, and use it constantly with a new baby around. It doesn't smell which is appreciated (though we have the wipes in Mandarin Orange and do think that smell is quite nice). It also doesn't seem to dry out your hands or leave any sort of residue. We've already repurchased twice.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have a smell at all, maybe a little hint of soap smell but that’s it. Really watery too, kinda makes me wonder if it’s really doing anything. Doesn’t dry out my hands and love to use this around the babies and on for my toddler. Overall I do like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Always use, the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Because a lot of coronaviruses are going up in price, this is a necessity for children, and I'm glad its price hasn't gone up!
customer_reviews.author: xuanjin

customer_reviews.title: Good for freshening hands
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Not sure it kills Coronavirus but the ingredients will kill other bacteria. I use for inside the house not after I come from the store or anything. After using the restroom or washing hands. Taking out trash or walking the dog etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Love ir
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I keep a bottle literally in every room. So easy to just pump in hand and sanitize before touching baby. And since I keep it handy, easy to ask others to use it before touching my newborn. Doesn’t irritate skin, no smell, A bit watery... but that doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance Free!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as I am allergic to many smells. I’ve detected no smell at all while using this product. I let the dog in and out in a rope, so sometimes I have to reel the rope in. The freedom from alcohol especially in the winter, helps my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, especially for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and it is absolutely worth the price! I have dry skin and my daughter has moderate to severe eczema and this does not sting, burn, or dry out either of our skin. It leaves no residue or scent. I have used this on my face for rosacea - it also does not sting, burn, or dry out my face!
customer_reviews.author: R & D Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Best baby safe sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hand sanitizer to have around a baby hands down. No scent and they clean without cracking your hands when you’re washing your hands every two minutes this is a great option to protect your skin and your baby from the alcohol most sanitizers use. The three pack is great bc you can have them all over your house.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to try this brand of hand sanitizer. It works very well and usefull. My baby likes it. This size is perfect to take with me. I know there is smaller size also. But I prefer this size and it is good value. Highly recommend ...smells good also.
customer_reviews.author: Vickey

customer_reviews.title: Dries too slow
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this was alcohol free until it arrived and didn’t dry/evaporate like I expected. My intent was to replace the scented alcohol hand sani with a baby friendly unscented version, but I can’t handle the extra dry time at 3am changing a diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The only sanitizer my daughter will use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has eczema, so regularly scratches her hands up and has small cuts. Other alcohol based sanitizers will sting her when she uses it, this one doesn't, so it's the only one she'll use. Pro tip - get the large refills and fill these bottles back up.
customer_reviews.author: Shanu V

customer_reviews.title: Must have for diaper table
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand sanitizer. It's not alcohol based but it's excellent to have on the diaper changing table to help kill bacteria right there and then after a change. Again, its for bad bacteria that gets you sick, not viruses (and good bacteria since alcohol kills all). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe Product, But Watery
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this hand sanitizer is free from chemicals, making it safe to use around baby. A little goes a long way with this product, so you don't need a lot which is nice because it will last a long time. I brought the three pack which is very useful, so I can have one in each room I am with my baby the most. My only dislike is that it is very watery. I have since found other natural hand sanitizers which I like better that are not watery.
customer_reviews.author: Hameed

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t ecstatic about having so many on hand when I saw this was an order of three. But it was perfect. One for the nursery, one for the living room and one in our bedroom. Super gentle and my hands never feel dry. I also breast feed and use it right before and my son never makes a sour face from accidentally tasting it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these. It encourages them to get their hands clean after daycare when it’s most important. I bought these because they were getting sick super frequently. It’s foam and it’s gentle. No alcohol makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: CourtNico

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as it once was
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it feels more like water than anything... I used it and it felt just like running water over my hands... I bought this 7 yrs ago with my first son and it was great but it has changed... Everyone knows companies are always substituting ingredients to make there revenue continue to grow but as I’ve learned from experience if it’s not broke don’t try to fix it...
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Feels like water
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if this works. Feels like water and takes a while to dry. Bought to keep a bottle in the car for the little kids, but I'm a little worried that this may not actually sanitize their hands.
customer_reviews.author: daymeeyan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have them at hand for sanitizing, and I really like the feel of them on my hands. I have actually ordered a set of small ones for the 2 cars and my purse. I also use gloves and wipes where appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Kate's Careful Reviews Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for less than 2 weeks and it’s done nothing but dry out my hands! Won’t be buying again and I’m not sure I’ll even use up what I have left.
customer_reviews.author: nic1018

customer_reviews.title: No scent and it works
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn’t have alcohol so it doesn’t dry out your skin. But it does leave a slightly tacky feel to your skin. It has no scent and the price was so reasonable. I received 3 8oz bottles for $18! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's feels like straight water
customer_reviews.text: This product comes out of the container as basically straight water. It does not foam, lather, or create any texture. I has no oder either. To be honest I think this product is not what it says it is and I feel like I have paid for incorrect advertisement of this product. I purchased this for protection against germs and it is in no way doing this job.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth
customer_reviews.text: For my two years old baby. I tried it on my skin. So smooth. I like it. Especially this is alcohol free, perfect for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kwang

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin baby's life saver!
customer_reviews.text: My baby's skin turns extremely sensitive during the spring, this sanitizer is a life saver. It keeps the hygen of my hand from being too much on her skin after using the alchohol based ones.
customer_reviews.author: CloHe

customer_reviews.title: Forever favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune disease and I have two small children who attend school. It’s important for us not to spread germs but I also want to keep them away from heavy scents and other irritants. This stuff is perfect! I have one in every major room in the house. I’m also buying the travel ones for backpacks! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Schlumper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought it for myself because I am at higher risk due to my age and health. Thought I cannot ascertain the level of efficacy I love that I have this as a line of defense and they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra from Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Changing table must have
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep on my changing table to clean hands after each diaper. I have extremely sensitive skin and have not had any issues since using babyganics. No harsh clinical smell like you get with Purell either. This has become a necessity for changing time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hartner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t contain alcohol!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this product until I realized this hand sanitizer was alcohol free! Not very beneficial if it can’t actually kill the germs. I returned the set once I realized.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of $. Not sure what this is honestly. Not hand sanitizer or foaming hand soap. It’s just foaming water that leaves your hands sticky. Save your money and buy something more legit.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: This sanitizer is amazing! I’m so glad they made it without alcohol! I have a newborn baby and little kids... I wanted something that wasn’t so harsh and potent. This doesn’t even really have a smell. It’s perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Trisha M Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed...
customer_reviews.text: Although fragrance free, it has a weird “cleanser-like” smell. Not like harsh chemicals, just an annoying smell. This does not have the CDC recommended alcohol levels to be considered a sanitizer, FYI. If you are looking for a true sanitizer, you are better off with Honest Brand’s offering.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Britt Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry your hands out
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and it was great. Doesn’t dry your hands out even after multiple uses per day. However, this batch of 3 was all a bit wrong. It doesn’t foam at all, just a liquidy puddle of sanitizer. I still gave it 5 stars because I wrote babyganics about the problem and they mailed me 3 coupons for free products so it could be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these delivered quicker than most products during the corona situation. No scent and easy for the kiddos to pump. Accidentally had one in my big purse for a couple days and there were no spills lol my niece is sensitive to chemicals and this did not give her a rash!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Great.. Minus fighting COVID
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my car as I drive for Lyft. This is a non sticky formula and has a light scent. The only downside is it doesn’t have alcohol which supposedly sanitizer needs to kill COVID
customer_reviews.author: DJ Quicksilver

customer_reviews.title: A drippy mess instead of a smooth foam
customer_reviews.text: They must’ve changed their formula from a couple years ago. Two of the three bottles so far give me a drippy mess instead of a nice foam. One pump and half of it is leaking through your fingers. Whatever you do, pump away from your clothes. Now i see other reviewers stating the ingredients aren’t certified organic and that’s distressing. I don’t even want to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works Without Drying My Hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the alcohol in other hand sanitizers was drying my hands. This works better for me and it doesn't have the odor that other sanitizers have. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I enjoy that it doesn’t smell or dark my hands out too bad. I’ve used this brand before and didn’t care for it but this stuff I’m in love with. I have a family member that swears by their products.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Miriam chadbourne

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have product when you have a newborn at home. It doesn't seem to dry out our hands or have an odor. I find myself constantly using it. We have one in almost every room of the house.. no we're not crazy just want to keep the baby healthy and Amazon rich.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Great for your icky and swirly toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my toddler before people were emptying the shelves and Im so glad I did. It’s tough to get her to let me properly wash her hands so this gives me that peace of mind. It doesn’t smell like your typical hand sanitizer and it does not leave her hands feeling dry. The pack of three is perfect so I can keep one in the car, home and diaper bag. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Ayon

customer_reviews.title: Funny smell and unpleasant texture
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the smell or feel of this sanitizer. It leaves a stickiness on your hands after. I will keep it for emergencies but not my favorite. Gets the job done I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Foamy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my family and friends to use when they visit my new addition. I dont notice a scent. Super easy to pump. My older children use it aswell. I havent notice any reaction from it to their skin or anyone elses.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jones

customer_reviews.title: We keep this on hand always!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite hand sanitizer! Love that’s there’s not a strong scent, easy on skin..kids and adults alike. Also love that it’s so much cleaner and safer than traditional hand sanitizers!
customer_reviews.author: MorganFam4

customer_reviews.title: No smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product has no odor, and no alcohol to burn my sensitive skin. It leaves my hands feeling soft and clean, with no sticky residue or smell. It is organic, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this instead of hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I found this product just as store shelves were selling out of sanitizer. This one is so gentle on skin and has no smell or weird feel.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for our newborn
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as the pandemic was getting worse, to my little newphew, we didn’t want to use alcohol on our newborn. We all ended up using it instead the alcohol one.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Mild and good for both kids and parents
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient for outdoor using. It feel like water, I even use it sometimes. I am not sure if it can kill virus because it is so mild that feel like water. But I definitely will give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Its a great value! I had a hard time finding the foaming sanitizer in the store so I resorted to buying it on here. At first I was hesitant to buy all three, but it ended up working out perfectly. We keep them in each bathroom and one in the kitchen. It’s easy for my 3.5 year old to use on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found these! Very useful for after diaper changes and just to have in the diaper bag. They do not leave any residue and have a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: No scent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have heard of this product for a long time, but haven’t had a chance to use until now. No scent at all and no sticky feel after use. I can now use this for travel and help clean my little one’s hands when there is no soap available.

customer_reviews.title: Good for our fragrance and skin sensitivities.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love this sanitizer! I am sensitive to some fragrances and my daughter gets excema on her hands. This is one of the few sanitizers that we both can use, hooray! No irritating scent and no stinging alcohol. I also like the foam better than gel sanitizers, it doesn't slide of wiggly hands so easily. I even bought the smaller travel size container from this brand and simply pour more into the travel size bottle when needed. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the hands.
customer_reviews.text: I found I really enjoy this hand sanitizer! It has no real fragrance and feels great on the skin. I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marmot47

customer_reviews.title: Love the non-alcohol-based sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: We like the non-alcohol-based sanitizers the alcohol one seem to dry out your hands these are awesome and the foaming make some easy to spread
customer_reviews.author: Jack Price

customer_reviews.title: Helps heal dry hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hand sanitizer because it is alcohol free. My hands were so dry and cracking from washing them a lot and from using alcohol based hand sanitizer all the time since I had my baby. i am so glad I purchased this hand sanitizer because my hands are slowly but surely healing. I keep one in my car and one on my daughter's changing table. Pros: -alcohol free which is better for my hands and safer for my baby -it's unscented -foam applicator is nice and it seems like a little goes a long way Cons: -can't think of any right now! -I do think it would be nice if they added a moisturizer to it :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Older daughter loves it because it doesn't taste bad
customer_reviews.text: My older daughter hates hand sanitizer because it alters the flavor of her thumb so she avoids washing or disinfecting using most products. However this is known as the special soap that she is happy to use because she can still suck her thumb afterwards!no lasting smell or taste.
customer_reviews.author: TNTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love knowing it’s safe for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sanitizer! Makes me feel a lot better knowing that I am using something safe for my baby considering I use it before touching her and picking her up. I keep one in her diaper caddy to use after changing her and put the others around the house!
customer_reviews.author: phmomof4

customer_reviews.title: how effective is this product
customer_reviews.text: I just realized this product does not contain alcohol and I am wondering if it will be good in killing germs like the virus we are dealing with now. I have read to kill germs on contact hand sanitizer should contain alcohol. Thank you for your response
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these for the different areas of my house! Can use multiple times a day without hands feeling dried out!
customer_reviews.author: Tori H

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big bottle. Not great for traveling but great for home or to have in the car. Truly fragrance free!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M Barnard

product_meta.title: Babyganics Alcohol-Free Foaming Hand Sanitizer, Pump Bottle, Fragrance Free, 8.45 oz, 3 Pack, Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Fragrance Free| Size:8.45 Ounce (Pack of 3)Two truths: Your baby wants to touch everything and everyone wants to touch your baby. It’s a beautiful thing. Except for the germs. Our alcohol-free foaming hand sanitizer is a must have around irresistible babies. Our hand sanitizer with plant-derived ingredients keeps hands germ-free on the go. Our sanitizer kills 99.9% of germs in as little as 15 seconds.
feature_bullets: Formulated without: Parabens, sulfates, phthalates, artificial fragrances or dyes
Alcohol free. Citrus fruits acts as a preservative, chelator, pH adjustor

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
